user.title: Connect to LibreTranslate
user.description: Enter connection details for your LibreTranslate server.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this server (used as device name)
data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of the LibreTranslate server
data_description.use_ssl: Enable if your server uses HTTPS
data_description.api_key: Leave blank if your server does not require authentication

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to LibreTranslate server. Check the host, port, and that the server is running.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Check your API key or leave blank if authentication is not required.
error.no_languages: Connected to server but no language models are installed. Install at least one language pair in LibreTranslate.
error.unknown: Unexpected error connecting to the server. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

translate.name: Translate text
translate.description: Translate text between languages using LibreTranslate.
